department.ch: 化學工程與材料工程學系

goal.ch: 了解與所有系統動態行為、製程操作和自動控制高度相關的化工製程控制基本問題。
goal.en: To understand basic issues of chemical process control which are highly relevant to all system dynamic behaviors, process operation and automatic control.

outline.ch:
程序控制是基於化工程序過程而進行控制設計的課程，因此在上課前同學請先行複習過去化工基礎學科。我們將在第一堂課回顧過去的背景是否能順利修習程序控制，包括質能平衡(，含動態)、1階與2階的ODE、反應器的質能平衡式(化工動力學＆化工熱力學)。而本學期授課內容包括：
 Control Loop Hardware
 Dynamic Modeling
 Feedback Control
 Classic Control Enhancements
outline.en:
Process Control is a course focused on control system design applied to chemical processes. Students are encouraged to review fundamental chemical engineering concepts prior to attending. In the first
meeting, we will revisit key topics, including process control basics, dynamic mass-energy balances, first- and second-order ODEs, and mass-energy equilibrium equations relevant to reactors, encompassing both chemical kinetics and thermodynamics.
This semester‘s course will cover the following topics:
 Control Loop Hardware
 Dynamic Modeling
 Feedback Control
 Classic Control Enhancements
